actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the printing of Reports of the Comptroller General of the United States as House Documents of the 95th Congress.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing, during adjournment, of the reports of the Comptroller General of the United States, pursuant to the Government Corporation Control Act, as House documents of the second session of the 95th Congress.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the printing of Reports of the Comptroller General of the United States as House Documents of the 95th Congress.
